title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that light is an energy source for photosynthesis.
The response indicates that light is an energy source for photosynthesis.

title: Part B (i)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The sketched line meets none of the criteria below.
The sketched line meets one of the criteria below.
The sketched line meets two of the criteria below.
The sketched line meets all of the criteria below.

title: Part B (ii)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that the concentrations on days 15 and 20 are statistically different (no error bar overlap), but the concentrations on days 20 and 25 are not statistically different (error bars overlap).

The response indicates that the concentrations on days 15 and 20 are statistically different (no error bar overlap), but the concentrations on days 20 and 25 are not statistically different (error bars overlap).

title: Part C (i)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that the time period during which Chlorella approximates exponential growth is days 0 through 15 or days 5 through 15 (either answer is acceptable).
The response indicates that the time period during which Chlorella approximates exponential growth is days 0 through 15 or days 5 through 15 (either answer is acceptable).

title: Part C (ii)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that the time period during which the Chlorella population has reached the carrying capacity of the culture is days 20 through 30 (best response based on overlapping error bars, but “days 25 through 30” is also acceptable).

The response indicates that the time period during which the Chlorella population has reached the carrying capacity of the culture is days 20 through 30 (best response based on overlapping error bars, but “days 25 through 30” is also acceptable).

stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

title: Part D (ii)
